longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission and transit refused to visitors who have transited
  Guinea, Liberia, Nigeria and Sierra Leone. 

Visa required. 

Additional Information:
- A deposit is required from visitors of 15 years and older
  not holding return/onward ticket (deposits to be made to a
  bank or the transporting airline) between XAF 15,000.- and
  XAF 250,000.- depending on country of commencement of  the
  journey. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry.



 Central African Rep
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 9 months of age. 
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
shortInfo: Если продолжительность пребывания в стране не превышает семи дней, визу можно оформить по прибытии в международном аэропорту. Стоимость визы — около 57 долларов США. Если планируется пробыть в ЦАР больше времени — необходимо заранее подавать заявление на визу.
